channel.title: Curse you Wilderness! Always a taunt

item.title: Curse you Wilderness! Always a taunt
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Ancient Epic Ancient
item.description:
@Epic_Ancient wrote:

[quote=“Scape-JAVA, post:13, topic:303950”]FOUND IT

Delete the Non Wildy Void.

public boolean IsInWilderness(int coordX, int coordY, int Type) { if (Type == 1) { if (coordY >= 3523 && coordY <= 3967 && coordX >= 3392 && coordX <= 2942 || absX >= 3220 && absX <= 3299 && absY >= 3520 && absY <= 3548) { return true; } } else if (Type == 2) { if (coordY >= 3512 && coordY <= 3967 && coordX >= 3392 && coordX <= 2942) { return true; } } return false; }
:o[/quote]

I’ll try.

Nvm - I had to use a backup because it wouldn’t stop giving me errors!
So, after fixing up everything, back to here. Lol.

Read full topic

item.title: Curse you Wilderness! Always a taunt
item.dc:creator: @Dell Dell
item.description:
@Dell wrote:

public boolean isInWilderness(int coordX, int coordY, int Type) { if (Type == 1) { if ((coordY >= 3523) && (coordY <= 3967) && (coordX <= 3392) && (coordX >= 2942) || absX >= 3220 && absX <= 3299 && absY >= 3520 && absY <=3548 || absX >= 2250 && absX <= 2296 && absY >= 4676 && absY <=4715) { return true; } } else if (Type == 2) { if ((coordY >= 3512) && (coordY <= 3967) && (coordX <= 3392) && (coordX >= 2942)) { return true; } } return false; }

You had coords wrong friend ;]

item.title: Curse you Wilderness! Always a taunt
item.dc:creator: @I_Yaa_I I Yaa I
item.description:
@I_Yaa_I wrote:

[quote=“Scape-JAVA, post:4, topic:303950”][quote author=I Yaa I link=topic=400213.msg2968447#msg2968447 date=1253760724]

[code]public boolean isInWilderness(int coordX, int coordY, int Type) {
	if (Type == 1) {
		if ((coordY >= 3523) && (coordY <= 3967) && (coordX <= 3392)
				&& (coordX >= 2942) || absX >= 3220 && absX <= 3299 && absY >= 3520 && absY <=3548 || absX >= 2377 && absX <= 2429 && absY >= 3070 && absY <=3143 || absX >= 2250 && absX <= 2296 && absY >= 4676 && absY <=4715) {
			return true;
		}
	} else if (Type == 2) {
		if ((coordY >= 3512) && (coordY <= 3967) && (coordX <= 3392)
				&& (coordX >= 2942)) {
			return true;
		}
	}
	return false;
}[/code]

is that it or is that the same Code lOl.

No its not, the coords are different
[/quote]

Damnit lemme fix it.[/quote]

why would you want to fix when yours is the right code?

item.title: Curse you Wilderness! Always a taunt
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Ancient Epic Ancient
item.description:
@Epic_Ancient wrote:

I’m curious on what’s wrong with my Wilderness coding…
The problem here is, that, everywhere used to be wild.
Now that I changed it, everywhere ISN’T Wild.
Thing is, I’d like to have Wild actually BE wild.

What’s wrong with this damned coding!?!?!

public boolean nonWild() { if((absX >= 3373 && absX <= 0001 && absY >= 3526 && absY <= 0001)|| heightLevel >= 0) return true; else return false; }

public boolean IsInWilderness(int coordX, int coordY, int Type) { if (Type == 1) { if (coordY >= 3527 && coordY <= 3940 && coordX >= 3374 && coordX <= 2945) { return true; } } else if (Type == 2) { if (coordY >= 3527 && coordY <= 3940 && coordX >= 3374 && coordX <= 2945) { return true; } } return false; }

Looks fine to me, but not much else works.

Random other coding that deals with “wild”:
–Can post in PM if requested; cannot post (exceeds 20000 characters ^^")

Read full topic
